title: IDSPBRMaterial.ThinFilm
description: Gets or sets the thin film layer weight for this material.
remarks:
For more information about this property:
Open https://dassaultsystemes-technology.github.io/EnterprisePBRShadingModel/spec-2025x.md.html in an internet browser, click CTRL-F and type "Thin film" in the pop up. Click
Next result
repeatedly.
Search for "Thin films" on the web.
